alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:58PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 645 PM MST... At 557 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kearny, or 9 miles west of Hayden, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Hayden, Christmas, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, and Claypool. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 248 and 255. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 260. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 135 and 141, near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 146 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
